name: pkrvcoffee
description: A PluralKit integration for Revolt (re)written in CoffeeScript!

scripts.build: rm -rf target/plugin.tmp.js && coffee -o target/plugin.tmp.js -cb --no-header src/index.coffee && node scripts/generateManifest.js
scripts.verbosebuild: rm -rf target/plugin.tmp.js && coffee -cbp --no-header src/index.coffee && coffee -o target/plugin.tmp.js -cb --no-header src/index.coffee && node scripts/generateManifest.js

author: Event Horizon Collective
